website_summaries.verdict: A classy full-meridian globe that looks good anywhere.
pros: Heavy, high-quality stand provides stability and the full-meridian design allows for x and y-axis rotation
A great-looking globe with up-to-date geography and raised mountain ranges
cons: The globe may rotate when released

customer_reviews.title: Awesome globe!! & up to date!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at tons of globes to purchase for my niece, I must say this is a pretty awesome one. It's up to date (Sudan/South Sudan), raised mountain ranges, the stand is of great quality and sturdy, x & y axis rotation, very nice globe! I didn't realize how stressful globe shopping could be haha! Look no more. You won't be disappointed with this one!
customer_reviews.author: lavenialivinglife

customer_reviews.title: Nice globe but missing important labels
customer_reviews.text: Globe seems to be well made, however I was very disappointed to see the continent of Asia is not labeled...they started with the letter “A”, but the “sia” is no where to be found. Also, the Euphrates River is not labeled, either.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: NO USA State Capitals!
customer_reviews.text: When we received this we we're very happy with the quality and weight of the world globe. The kids loved looking at the different states and foreign countries. Last week, my daughter needed to look up the capitals of several states for homework. We got the globe down only to discover that none of the capitals are on it. I bought this globe to help my children with homework; specifically state capitals in America. Now I have to buy a map of the USA. The quality would have been 5 stars but without state capitals, it's useless to me so it only gets 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Globe for my 7 year old daughter as a Christmas present, she's been interested in where we are at in the world, and this globe is exactly what I was hoping for. Very solid build, zero complaints, spins super smoothly, looks very sleek, has metal hardware and frame/base. Super pleased with this globe. Great addition to any household.
customer_reviews.author: BTDavis

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this globe
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a globe for our young children. I am a homeschooler and a former teacher. We were looking for good quality without a huge price tag, but not bottom of the barrel. We spent a lot of time reading reviews and purchased this Advantus 12 inch globe. We are very satisfied with the quality and design of this globe. It feels good and solid, not loose or rickety. The seams and longitude lines are 99% correctly lined up. We like the colors and level of detail on this globe. Overall I would highly recommend this globe for homeschoolers or the average adult!
customer_reviews.author: CRgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe
customer_reviews.text: We love our globe at homeschool. The globe rotates easily and I love that you can rotate it up and down to better view the Southern Hemisphere. The stand is secure. The colors on the globe are bright and well labeled. The seams between Northern and Southern Hemispheres line up perfectly. There is one spot on our globe that seems slightly bubbled which is why I deducted a star. We use our globe daily in homeschool and I'm happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Raised mountains, includes South Sudan, spins all ways.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful world globe with updated borderlines. It included South Sudan. Also, the mountains are raised which makes it even better. But the best of this globe is that it spins two way, that way you can easily look at the whole globe including Antarctica without lifting it up. It looks better than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kinga M.

customer_reviews.title: Overated and  way to expensive
customer_reviews.text: We found a brand new, better looking and bigger product at Costo for Just $ 20! What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Great globe! Fun for kids and it does says "ASIA"
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old loves it! Big enough to read the text without taking over his whole desk. I almost didnt buy it because of the reviews saying it only has the "A" in "ASIA", but it's there. It goes upward on the globe, instead of straight across. The colors are bright and the topography adds a bonus sensory feature. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this globe!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I wanted a globe for my 8 yr old daughter that was of good quality and pleasing to the eye, but I didn't want to pay an arm and a leg for one. I received this globe today upon opening the box I was already pleased. It was very well packaged. The original box from the company was inside of another box from amazon. The globe was already put together too! I know there are cheaper options out there but this one is worth the extra dollars I payed. Now I just have to keep my 3 yr old from coloring all over it or I'll be on here ordering it again..
customer_reviews.author: Jesusdied4u

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe!
customer_reviews.text: After researching globes for my 6-yr-old granddaughter, I decided this was the best choice and I am not disappointed. The globe is colorful and clear. It is made of sturdy matte plastic material that will withstand lots of little fingers, and the attractive chrome base is heavy with a flocked bottom. The twin axises make it easy to see all points. This globe also distinguishes all the states in the USA, a detail many other globes did not have. My granddaughter loves this globe and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Copland

customer_reviews.title: A World of Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, visually seamless, weighty base, nice to look at, labeling easy to read, love the gimbal construction. I gave it as a gift, inspecting it thoroughly first, and was well-pleased with the appearance and general look and feel of distinction. Also, it arrived in a well-designed box (globe-specific) with interior packaging that protected it completely. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: W.G. Easley

customer_reviews.title: Good but one accuracy issue
customer_reviews.text: The coastline of my husband's home country, Ecuador, has been smoothed out. It is not accurate, which is a bummer since we obviously want to teach our child about the geography of his father's country. I'm not sure of the total accuracy of the other coastlines and country borders, but they seem okay. The globe appears to be well made and has held up nicely. Spins easily and is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Scriven de Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great globe
customer_reviews.text: Large, readable globe with raised mountain ranges. U.S. states are different colors so they are easily identified. X and Y axis rotation is a nice feature. Good weight and an attractive, stable base. Have not seen a globe this well made with these features and attention to detail in this price range. Highly recommend. Purchased this from MyOfficeInnovations. It was received 5 days after placing the order, which was the day before the projected 6 day delivery window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, good quality globe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so our kids could learn about the world. They are young so I wanted something durable and this seems to be. The country (and US state) borders are clearly defined. I like the raised mountains. I like how the globe tilts as well as rotates - this make it very easy to view the entire surface. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a high quality but affordable globe that doesn’t plug in or require batteries.
customer_reviews.author: farmineer

customer_reviews.title: Good value with one exception
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this globe does rotate north to south way too easily. I was able to fix this by taking out one of the screws and adding a spacer washer. While this wasn't hard for me to do... I had the tools and the washer on hand. Not everyone has the tools (a small metric allen wrench and a pair of needle nose vice grips) and possibly the mechanical know how to do this. The Manufacturer needs to rethink the components in this aspect. Otherwise I like it and I think it deserves the 4 stars I gave it....fix that issue and I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This is the Globe you want
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, and the steel base and rings set it apart from other globes with plastic, wood or cheap-looking diecast aluminum/lead/pewter alloys. I haven't checked the labeling for geographic accuracy, but who relies on a globe for that? (maybe the Amish, but everyone else uses the internet). My only minor complaints are the color of Antarctica (which is green on this globe, rather than white as on EVERY OTHER GLOBE), and the lack of any tension on the rings, to keep it from flipping onto its side.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, nice globe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. My interests include history and current affairs. It is well made. All the coastlines and longitudinal lines line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe.  More For Practical Use Than Decoration.
customer_reviews.text: Great meridian movement to this globe. The overall design and construction are kind of basic\elementary. I'd prefer a more sophisticated globe, especially at that size. But I'm an adult, and it was for decoration as well as practical use. I loved the raised geographic details. That was a great touch. And the additional information, like the solstice dates, were an appreciated touch. Great globe overall. I just wouldn't use it as a decorative piece.
customer_reviews.author: AFMcCl3llan

customer_reviews.title: Completely Rotates - Great for Learning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a decorative piece in my office but Its actually turned into a great learning device for my kids. They like to spin around and guess the country with a quick glance. They've gotten quite good! I uploaded an image so you can see how large the globe is. I thought it would be smaller but it still fit the space great.
customer_reviews.author: IslandShopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Globe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful colors. Easy-to-read. Beautiful metal stand. I really like the double axis stand (if that’s what you call it.) The stand will hold the globe in any position you want. If you want New Zealand near the top of the globe 🌏 the stand holds it there. Well crafted! Only one seam! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality with a few minor exceptions
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this globe is very good. I didn't realize when ordering it that it had raised relief features, but it does. The gimbaled base is very useful when you want to examine the southern hemisphere, and is much better than a fixed axis globe. The alignment between the hemispheres on our globe is pretty good, though not perfect. The analemma is not drawn accurately and isn't marked with dates, just seasons, but this isn't a feature we ever use, so it isn't an issue for us. The time zone disk at the north pole doesn't seem to be rotatable like on other globes, though possibly loosening the top screw would allow it to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R. Teitlebaum

customer_reviews.title: Good colors and raised-relief
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 5 year old granddaughter who lives 1,000 miles away. Now she has a reference for how far relatives live. She was excited when she open the box and even knew it was a globe. We really liked the raised-relief of the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bear

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful globe, well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that shopping for a globe was such a fraught process but by the time I found this one, I was a bit overwhelmed and over the whole thing. But I could not have been more pleased when this one arrived. Very sturdy packaging and then the globe itself is gorgeous. Easy to use, spins beautifully, nice heavy base. The kids were immediately drawn to it. I was annoyed with the price when I ordered but now that it's here, I feel like I got a bargain for how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: best world globe for viewing
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my wife and i to use for world events great size came double- boxed with plenty of padding box was pristine no corners crushed,took it out is great because it can rotate on its axsis and compleatly top to bottom. Great price ,great product,great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin J. Mino

customer_reviews.title: Great globe
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice globe to put on a shelf in my office that is under construction. I love the fact that it can spin both horizontally and vertically. Only drawback is that there are arrows pointing to the states because the lettering is too big to put on the actual map of the state. Not a biggie, I mostly wanted it to see the overall countries. It even has raised areas showing mountain ranges. (almost like the globes from back in the day). Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 4 yr old daughter who is constantly asking me questions about the world. After reading several reviews of different products, I settled on this one because it seemed to be the highest quality within the <$70 price range. I rarely write Amazon reviews, but compelled to write a review for this product: it is exceptionally well made. It has withstood several rounds of vigorous spinning, no problem. The raised mountains are a nice touch and have already attracted my 4 yr old's attention. The metal base and brackets surrounding the globe look slightly cheap, but they are actually heavy stainless steel. I caught myself studying it several times already!
customer_reviews.author: Altaholic86

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I gave globes to two family members. They are well designed to be moved into a variety of positions, clear to read and up to date in the shifting borders of some parts of the world. Both recipients liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lila L. Aurich

customer_reviews.title: Mine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom & was going to be reimbursed but I said, "Forget it!" I will pay for this & I will keep it! If the school paid for it I would have to leave it at the school- NO WAY that's happening. This is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mayflower

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, attractive
customer_reviews.text: This globe does the job. Raised relief makes it a better learning tool than some other globes. It is sturdy and looks like it could have cost a lot more. Reminds me of the ones I had in school, with similar/same size. Spins well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Norman

customer_reviews.title: MIA Iwo Jima
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely globe, very pretty and swivels around like a dream. But don't go looking for Iwo Jima because it's not there. It says it was manufactured in Taiwan, so I can't help but wonder what else has been omitted....
customer_reviews.author: McDart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality world globe. Priced very fair. Super durable and easy to read. Highly satisfied with the quality. My daughter loves to look at the globe and see where everything is at. Shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and sturdy globe! We are working on a lot of geography and my kids loved to be able to feel the mountains and check out the globe. My 5 year old was easily able to find our state and the country I asked him to find (which he had only ever looked at on a blow up globe from the dollar store). Very excited to add this to our homeschool classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, Practical and Intriguing for all Ages!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift to my daughters third grade teacher this year (because teachers need ALL the help they can get!). Not only did she love the size, flexibility and detail, the kids were exploring the mountain ranges and excited to be able to REALLY look at all of the earth from different angles. I many buy one for myself next!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Truman

customer_reviews.title: Could be 5 stars if...
customer_reviews.text: I like this globe for our homeschool classroom. It spun a bit too easily and didn't hold position. We were able to take it apart and modify it (with some difficulty) and then put it back together so that it holds its position when looking at a specific place. Had this globe not needed any modification it would have been five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent globe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew a couple of years ago (he was two then, and is now approaching five), and it's remained in good shape and has gotten a lot of use. My nephew loves that it's a serious, adult-looking globe and not a cheesy plastic globe for kids. It's a nice piece, and seems quite sturdy. I think he'll continue to enjoy it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful beautiful globe! I just received this and am thrilled with the overall quality of this item. I wasn’t sure that I wanted to spend this much but the reviews kept bringing me back. Excellent weight, very easy to move around in all directions. I especially like that it’s felted on the bottom so that it won’t scuff furniture.
customer_reviews.author: McLain

customer_reviews.title: Not very substantial.  The globe keeps falling upside down.
customer_reviews.text: The globe keeps falling upside down and cannot be adjusted. It is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Sachs

customer_reviews.title: well packaged and arrived in great shape. Looks very nice on my desk and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, well packaged and arrived in great shape. Looks very nice on my desk and is very useful for quick references.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed and attractive world globe that students will love
customer_reviews.text: A really excellent world globe. I purchased it for use by young elementary school students at a school where I tutor. The globe is impressive by its high quality construction. The students were immediately attracted to it and began asking questions, such as where countries are located and how the earth's rotation results in the daytime/nighttime cycle.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Kistler

customer_reviews.title: really beautiful globe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this globe for our homeschool room. I was nervous because you never know the quality of a globe, and if the seems will line up or the accuracy of the map. I was so pleased when it arrived. It is really a beautiful globe with everything matching up and accurate. My son really likes that it has two different rotations. I like that it is stable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: elicia saunders

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Lumps under the map at random places!
customer_reviews.text: It’s has big bumps under the paper ( no, it’s not 3D or anything), just at random places, like somebody took some round circular cardboard and put lots of glue lumps on it and then wrapped a paper around it! I think glue lumps is what u feel underneath the map paper! Don’t wanna get into hassle of returning it, so I m keeping it! My kid is happy looking at it!
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great globe for our kids and homeschool
customer_reviews.text: Compared this globe to other low-priced options. Liked that it both spins but also rotates up and down. Also has some texture (e.g., mountain ranges). Some cheaper globes leave out cities or don't do the states (in the US, and probably only of interest if you are in the US).
customer_reviews.author: Greg V.

customer_reviews.title: A very good globe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, they were very pleased with it. If I were to buy globe for myself it would be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Quality globe
customer_reviews.text: Great color quality, spins nicely in both directions, has raised mountains, notes the rivers and flow of oceans. Best globe I’ve ever had. I did quite a bit of research and comparing before I bought this, and I’m glad that I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and a high quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Very well defined in it’s presentation. I have a huge smile on my face. This globe is a Christmas Gift to myself. A handsome addition to my home. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Bolita

customer_reviews.title: Very useful & durable in a classroom
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and stable base. Accurate and durable. I love the twin axis design for accessibility but the horizontal axis should be tighter so it holds its position better.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnN

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Globe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great globe. Looks like it will last a long time. All the graphics are clear and easy to read. The country colors and ocean features all great. So much easier than going thru pages of an atlas, at least for major info. Very happy with this purchase. Thanks for all who wrote reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice globe.
customer_reviews.text: Great globe to help one understand where things are --- cities in small countries are shown which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lam

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We love this globe. It’s well marked and you can even feel the mountain ranges as you alike your fingers across the globe. Spins well and rotates well.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Globe
customer_reviews.text: This Globe is well made with a strong chrome looking base to prevent it from being wobbly. It turns easily and stays where you put it. The colors are rich and names easy to read. It looks great to use as a display piece. I bought two different Globes (not from Amazon) before this one in the $20.00 to $30.00 range and they were absolute junk and were returned. This one impressed me!
customer_reviews.author: Laptop Guy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 yr old Grandson. Very good quality and he loves the raised texture
customer_reviews.author: Simmon

customer_reviews.title: Seems really great!
customer_reviews.text: I researched many globes in this price range, and this one got the best reviews. Now that it has arrived, I am not disappointed. It's pleasingly colorful, features topography, and seems well-made in terms of construction. It will work well for finding out where things are in relation to each other (kid use and casual adult use).
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Critic 2

customer_reviews.title: Big globe!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had a globe like this when I was a kid. Its big, nice material, rotates as you want it to, and bumpy to depict the mountains. Very, very nice globe! Highly recommended for all parents and travelers of all ages
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: 12 Inch Desktop World Globe with Blue Oceans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this globe for personal use. For the price I found it to have more features than expected. There are features I would like it to have, but It is because I am just wanting a hundred dollar globe for less than 50 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the high quality. It's heavy and the base is very high quality. The size is nice and I love love love how it can tilt so I don't have to lift it. The one and only con is that the countries are in red font and it's really hard to read. You'll definitely need a magnifying glass. I use the magnifier feature and the flashlight on my ipad to view it and that works out wonderfully. It's very beautiful. The colors are bright. I strongly recommend it as long as you have a good magnifying glass and put it in a well lit spot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingSupergirl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6-year-old grandson who is very interested in maps. He loves the globe, which is sturdy and well-constructed. I highly recommend this particular globe. It’s a great one for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A-barth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that now whenever my kids ask where a place is, I can now show them where it is on the globe! The colors make it easy to point out to them, and they like learning about different countries!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality globe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren and the quality is fantastic. Its a nice size and easy to read. The colors are bright. Love how it spins in all directions. You can feel mountains.
customer_reviews.author: auntevie

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our 6 year old granddaughter. She absolutely loved it. Beautifully constructed and the surface features are beautifully rendered. A great first globe that will not be outgrown through elementary and middle school.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kobiljak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful globe! It's not perfect there are 2-3 places were the countries do not line up "perfectly" it isn't noticeable when just looking at the globe you must search for it. The clairity and colors are really nice. This globe is one of the best looking ones I've found under $150. If your looking for an accurate globe for kids, the office, or just your home this one is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe
customer_reviews.text: I got this Globe for my twin grandsons. We all love it and it's easy to read and also very pretty. So happy with my purchase and I would certainly recommend this as gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn M. Rasberry

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it -- adults and children alike
customer_reviews.text: After extensive travel, I realized that children can easily grow up today seeing the world as flat! Places are seen on flat maps and the awareness of where we live in relation to Patagonia or Siberia is difficult to visualize. My grandchildren are enthralled by the globe and eager to learn. Adults marvel at how long it's been since they saw one. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great globe! kids love it. Has all the features you would want in a globe including the bumps in the mountainous regions. The glossy steel finish is attractive, size and scale is perfect. The only feature I do not like is the globe is allowed to swivel off its axis. I assume this is to make viewing the southern hemisphere easier. Worth the few extra dollars over comparable products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put it near a heat source
customer_reviews.text: Great. Until heat got near it and ruined it. It was sitting on the fireplace ledge and the fire was set to 68 degrees. Update: they replaced it
customer_reviews.author: clarkmp

customer_reviews.title: This globe is awesome. The paper lining is smooth and pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This globe is awesome. The paper lining is smooth and pleasing. It’s well made and very attractive as well as accurate and useful. I got this as a gift and the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Clark R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Globe
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is good, but the "raised relief" is a joke. California is not flat y'all.
customer_reviews.author: w345

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice globe! It's sturdy, easy to read, and looks great. We've had no problems with the axes holding their position when moved as some other reviewers did.
customer_reviews.author: KitVonDTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product-Poor QA QC...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed and returned item. Item was not put together at all. For the amount of money spent, I should not have to spend any time tightening loose screws.
customer_reviews.author: SRQ_Nic

customer_reviews.title: Quality Globe for home or office
customer_reviews.text: Good quality as compared to the first globe I got for $20. Sturdy enough for a kid. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: al ridgway

customer_reviews.title: globe for learning
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves studying maps and geography. He is in the second grade and looks at the globe almost daily for different places on the map.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but misrepresentation of the color.
customer_reviews.text: The color of the oceans isn't turquoise like in the picture! It's just light blue. The metal is silver and doesn't have a blue hint either. But, overall it is very sturdy and is very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Learning aid for elementery students
customer_reviews.text: Size is adequate for young students. United State shows individual state lines, some other globes do not. Raise relief is used to depict some mounting ranges adding a feel of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: This globe is perfect. I previously ordered (and returned) a larger and more expensive one, as the information on it was so minimal that it was useless. This one has a great deal of detail, and it's surprisingly-easy to read, PLUS it's gyro and stays in place where rotated, unlike the one I returned.
customer_reviews.author: beesong

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice globe. The surface seems to be made of some type of vinyl instead of paper, which I like. Will be easy to keep clean from grimy little hands. I do wish the meridian was numbered. However, I thought I was buying what is pictured, a physical globe. I received a political globe, which is what is in the description. I should have paid attention to the description instead of relying on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: ksny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy globe
customer_reviews.text: This globe exceeded my expectations. Sturdy design, beautiful and clearly marked. This globe is a welcome addition to our homeschool.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our homeschooling and it is a great globe. It has depth changes too which is kind of a cool extra. Overall happy with my purchase and it’s perfect for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Davidson

customer_reviews.title: it appears to be an excellent globe. At this point
customer_reviews.text: Although we just received this globe and don't have comments on how well the product will hold up, it appears to be an excellent globe. At this point, we are very confident that we made the right choice from among the selection available aided by the very positive reviews of others. We like the relief that indicates mountain ranges, etc as well as the fact that it rotates in different spheres. The silver stand is also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: John Lyons

customer_reviews.title: I love this globe so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this globe so much! It arrived well packaged. I used it to teach a lesson to some of the kids at my church and it was a big hit! The way it turns makes it so you can see all areas of the globe. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice globe. Can move it all directions to easily see everything. In response to the review that said there is no “Asia” label, it’s there. It extends up and over through Kazakhstan, Mongolia and the edge of Russia.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Colorful Globe
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these in last 2 months...so, must be a great globe! ...Yep, it is!!! Strong quality and bright! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Raised relief feature and blue oceans
customer_reviews.text: This World Globe is exactly what we wanted. We love the raised relief feature and the blue oceans. We had previously purchased a a lighted globe with yellow oceans and it ended up not being at all what we wanted. You won't go wrong if you purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I had never gotten a glove because I was always skeptical about quality... this is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Calixto

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size. I love the rigid mountains that you can feel. Spins multiple ways.
customer_reviews.author: kerrie pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great GLOBE ON HANDSOME STAND
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors on this globe. It has matte finish which is very nice! The stand is beautiful and has some heft to it.
customer_reviews.author: Right Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a young child. It is great! His family travels extensively, so I wanted something true to reality, easy to read, and big enough to really enjoy. The child loves it - and so do his parents!
customer_reviews.author: M A P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this globe I decided to purchase it. The reviews are right. This is a solid globe with good detail. It is much heavier than I expected. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: JustJanexx

customer_reviews.title: This is such good quality, a professor could have on the desk.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every cent I would have paid more for the quality of this globe. 🌎 My daughter loves it and is learning so much.
customer_reviews.author: April A. Vitkow

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: Looked through a lot of reviews before finding this globe. It has a quality support system and is very detailed. I would recommend it to others, very pleased with purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Phoroptor

customer_reviews.title: Helps visualize Earth
customer_reviews.text: Gift to 7 year old grandson. He loves it. We talk about places I've been and about the moon walk and space station. Now he understands the earth and space much better. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: I made a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect introduction to our Earth for anyone, as young as 4
customer_reviews.author: SadieMaeD

customer_reviews.title: Every child needs one
customer_reviews.text: exceptional!! My son loves it and is always asking for me to help find a place. Now he is getting to where he can identify a place then I point at it.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great globe
customer_reviews.text: Love this globe bought it for my 7year old niece very nicely made and stable with a great base so it doesn’t tip over when you spin it It sins in both directions so that you can see the polar regions
customer_reviews.author: kristine case

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and a Nice Surface
customer_reviews.text: The globe is fine, although I did decide to return it. $Fifty Five is a bit too much to spend on something I won't use very often.
customer_reviews.author: Chasman357

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my daugther to look at and review georgraphy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not too small not too large. Seems to be right size for her to review geography.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: it is a wonderful globe
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for grandson. He really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: SAFETY GUY

customer_reviews.title: damaged globe
customer_reviews.text: item arrived damaged - big crack right through the gulf of mexico and central america. otherwise a nice globe.
customer_reviews.author: gnick

customer_reviews.title: bubbly
customer_reviews.text: Way too many bumps and bubbles on the one I received. Makes it look cheap and a bit tacky. So disappointed because nobody else seems to have one with this many flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift to Share and Teach
customer_reviews.text: A globe was given to my Grandson when he was eight. He loved playing, " Can you find- - - ! The globe you sent to Braden, my Great Grandson, will be a game played with his father. In the process he will have learned about the continents, countries and placement of land masses on the earth, while having fun with his father. I am very pleased with the globe that I selected.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Globe
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Accurate and easy to read. Spins smoothly. Quality product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: gregh

product_meta.title: Advantus 12 Inch Desktop World Globe with Blue Oceans (30502)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Explore the world of geography with the Advantus Desktop World Globe with Blue Oceans. This 12-inch world globe includes thousands of locations and geographical features highlighted with bright contrasting colors. It is mounted on a silver full-meridian and base and features raised relief. Globe measures 12 x 15 x 13 inches and is a perfect addition to any classroom.
feature_bullets: 12-inch political world globe with blue oceans is perfect for the home or classroom
Shows natural coloration of the earth to illustrate mountains, deserts, forests, and grasslands
Features blue oceans show undersea physical features and raised relief
Mounted on a silver-finish full meridian and base. This is a assembled globe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars721 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
